t: Brand Harmony
s: December 19, 2018 - The idea of brand harmony or brand harmonization is not new. It’s the idea that there is importance in ensuring that all products within a particular brand portfolio have a consistent name, visual identity and, ideally, positioning across a number of geographic or product/service markets.
